Title: AKA The Sandwich Saved Me
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Dana Baratta, Jenna Reback (staff writer)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Rachael Taylor, Wil Traval, Erin Moriarty
Plot: Despite Jessica's objections, Trish's new friend Simpson gets involved in the hunt for Kilgrave. Jessica recalls a pivotal moment in her life.
